page.title: 08Farming:Gillamoor Area
page.content: The area consists of about 400 acres of good farmland.The size of the farms range from about 35 to 100 acres.Four farms are tenanted, being part of the Ravenswick Estate and two are owned by the farmers.A 25 acre area at Lowna is owned by a farmer at Sinnington and an employee lives in the farmhouse. The 100 acre farm employs 3 men and the others are all family run. These farms are all mixed, having land under arable rotation and growing wheat, oats, barley,rape,turnips and potatoes A recent change here is less barley sown in the spring and more winter sown wheat and barley. One farm keeps dairy cows but another stopped dairying last year. Most farmers have sheep, some have beef cattle and one has pigs.
